_meta.name: Autocurated Seed URLs for Authoritative Hindi Spellings
_meta.description: Deterministic, allowlisted seed URLs for nightly autonomous curation without search APIs. The curator crawls these seeds politely, extracts Devanagari candidates, verifies via transliteration scoring, and writes mappings with provenance.
usage_notes: Only add official/credible government portals (gov.in, nic.in, census, egramswaraj, state portals).
Keep the list small and focused on directories/sitemaps or landing pages with links to gram panchayat / village / ULB / ward lists.
The web curator respects robots.txt, rate limits, and caches responses. Do not add sites that disallow crawling.
If a domain frequently yields false positives, remove or disable the corresponding seed.
_meta.edit_instructions: Add/remove entries under `seeds`. Use `enabled=false` to keep entries documented but inactive. Update `allowlisted_domains` when adding new official domains.
